languages.text: {n}Лицо Тервантьяса застывает презрительной маской, но рабочие конечности начинают нервно дергаться, а грудь вздымается с механическим хрустом, словно гемункулу внезапно перестало хватать воздуха.{/n}
{n}Tervantias's face stiffens into a mask of contempt but his working limbs begin to twitch nervously and his chest heaves with a mechanical creak as if he is suddenly running out of air.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Лицо Тервантьяса застывает презрительной маской, но рабочие конечности начинают нервно дергаться, а грудь вздымается с механическим хрустом, словно гемункулу внезапно перестало хватать воздуха.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tervantias's face stiffens into a mask of contempt, but his working limbs begin to twitch nervously and his chest heaves with a mechanical creak, as if the haemonculus was suddenly running out of air.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le visage de Tervantias arbore un masque de mépris, mais ses membres fonctionnels commencent à se contracter nerveusement. Sa poitrine se soulève dans un grincement mécanique, comme s'il manquait soudainement d'air.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Tervantias's face stiffens into a mask of contempt but his working limbs begin to twitch nervously and his chest heaves with a mechanical creak as if he is suddenly running out of air.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le visage de Tervantias arbore un masque de mépris, mais ses membres fonctionnels commencent à se contracter nerveusement. Sa poitrine se soulève dans un grincement mécanique, comme si l'hémoncule manquait soudainement d'air.{/n}

languages.text: {n}特万提亚斯的脸依然摆着轻蔑的表情，但他的四肢开始紧张地抽搐，胸口也发出了机械的咯吱声，就像是个突然泄了气的皮球一样。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Tervantias's face stiffens into a mask of contempt but his working limbs begin to twitch nervously and his chest heaves with a mechanical creak as if he is suddenly running out of air.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}特万提亚斯的脸依然摆着轻蔑的表情，但他的四肢开始紧张地抽搐，胸口也发出了机械的咯吱声，就像是个突然泄了气的皮球一样。{/n}

languages.text: {n}テルヴァンティアスの顔は軽蔑の表情でこわばったが、その手足は緊張で痙攣し始め、胸は機械的な軋みを上げている。まるで体から突然空気が抜けたかのようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Tervantias's face stiffens into a mask of contempt but his working limbs begin to twitch nervously and his chest heaves with a mechanical creak as if he is suddenly running out of air.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}テルヴァンティアスの顔は軽蔑の表情でこわばったが、その手足は緊張で痙攣し始め、胸は機械的な軋みを上げている。まるで体から突然空気が抜けたかのようだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tervantias' Gesicht versteift sich zu einer bloßen Maske der Verachtung, aber seine Gliedmaßen zucken nervös und sein Brustkorb hebt sich mechanisch knarrend, als ob er plötzlich keine Luft mehr bekäme.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Tervantias's face stiffens into a mask of contempt but his working limbs begin to twitch nervously and his chest heaves with a mechanical creak as if he is suddenly running out of air.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tervantias' Gesicht versteift sich zu einer bloßen Maske der Verachtung, aber seine Gliedmaßen zucken nervös und sein Brustkorb hebt sich mechanisch knarrend, als ob der Hämonkulus plötzlich keine Luft mehr bekäme.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La expresión de Tervantias se endurece hasta convertirse en una máscara de odio; sus apéndices funcionales empiezan a sacudirse nerviosamente y su pecho se hincha con un crujido mecánico, como si de repente estuviera quedándose sin aire.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Tervantias's face stiffens into a mask of contempt but his working limbs begin to twitch nervously and his chest heaves with a mechanical creak as if he is suddenly running out of air.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La expresión de Tervantias se endurece hasta convertirse en una máscara de odio; sus apéndices funcionales empiezan a sacudirse nerviosamente y su pecho se hincha con un crujido mecánico, como si de repente el hemónculo estuviera quedándose sin aire.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tervantia'nın yüzü katılaşıp aşağılayıcı bir ifade meydana getiriyor. İşlemekte olan uzuvları ise gergin bir şekilde seğiriyor, göğsü de aniden havasız kalmış gibi mekanik bir gıcırtıyla kabarıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Tervantias's face stiffens into a mask of contempt but his working limbs begin to twitch nervously and his chest heaves with a mechanical creak as if he is suddenly running out of air.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tervantia'nın yüzü katılaşıyor ve aşağılayıcı bir ifadeye bürünüyor ancak işlemekte olan uzuvları gergin bir şekilde seğiriyor ve göğsü, aniden havasız kalmış gibi mekanik bir gıcırtıyla kabarıyor.{/n}
